name: Zunimassa's String of Skulls
flavorText: When threatened, she drew upon the spirits to unleash the fury buried within.
flavorTextHtml: When threatened, she drew upon the spirits to unleash the fury buried within.

primary.textHtml: Critical Hit Chance Increased by [8.0 - 10.0]%
Increases Fetish Army Damage by [20 - 25]%

setDescription:
(2) Set:     
 Your Fetish Army lasts until they die and the cooldown of your Fetish Army is reduced by 80%.(4) Set:     
 You and your pets take 3% less damage for every Fetish you have alive.(6) Set:     
 Enemies hit by your Mana spenders take 15,000% increased damage from your pets for 8 seconds.
setDescriptionHtml:
(2) Set:
Your Fetish Army lasts until they die and the cooldown of your Fetish Army is reduced by 80%.
(4) Set:
You and your pets take 3% less damage for every Fetish you have alive.
(6) Set:
Enemies hit by your Mana spenders take 15,000% increased damage from your pets for 8 seconds.
